===Overview===
The Corsican Brotherhood was a criminal association that was organized into crime families and dominated the underworld in Marseilles.{{r|Punisher: G-Force Vol 1 1}}
===Corsican Groups===
* [[Chauvin Family (Earth-616)|Chauvin Family]]

| Equipment               =

| Notes                   = 
| Trivia                  = Corsican Brotherhood is one of the names by which the Unione Corse (aka, Corsican Union) goes by. It's an ethnic Corsican mob active mostly in Corsica and the seaport / city of Marseilles in France. They were made famous in the "French Connection" case.[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unione_Corse] They used to control the heroin trade in Europe and supplied the American Italian Mafia with heroin from Turkey, before they were displaced in the European and American heroin trade by the Silician Mafia (who were later displaced by the Mexican and Colombians in the United States, and in Europe by their previous suppliers, the Turkish Mafia).
